newborn_littermate: [You flop on top of t_c and they let out an annoyed squeak.]
assertive_newborn1: [t_c seems to already be trying to squirm their way out of the nest!]
assertive_newborn2: [t_c is the loudest kitten in the nursery!]
assertive_newborn3: [t_c noses their siblings out of the way to nurse.]
introspective_NB: [You turn to see a newborn crawling around on their own outside the nursery. How on earth did they get here?]
[You pick them up, and carry them back to the nursery.]
[You turn around to have a chat with a clanmate for five minutes.]
[You need to have a chat with the Queens.]
introspective_NB_1: [You walk into the nursery to check on how the kittens were.]
[A queen smiles and gestures to a Newborn tucked into their side, gently snoring]
[You politely smile at the queen and leave.]
introspective_NB_2: [You're sat grooming yourself in the clearing.]
[They turn around and stumble away. You're too surprised to grab them before they crawl back to the nursery. Seems at the minimum that they have a good sense of direction?]
introspective_NB_3: [t_c walks into your side when wandering around the nursery.]
[They flop over and lay against you, seemingly satisfied with where they are.]
[Guess you're not moving any time soon.]
introspective_NB_4: [You notice a newborn kitten... t_c? t_c sits in the corner.]
[They don't look distressed so you decide to leave them there.]
introspective_NB_5: [A newborn kitten yells at you from the nursery. You walk over and flick your tail over their face]
sweet_newborn_1: [t_c seems to cuddle closer to you, purring]
sweet_newborn_2: [t_c seems to reach their tiny little paw up, placing it on your nose with what you could swear is an itty bitty smile]
silly_newborn_1: [t_c reaches up and tries to touch your nose.]
silly_newborn_2: [t_c mews even louder than the rest of their litter, as if it were a competition.]
silly_newborn_3: [t_c is making a sound that sounds vaguely like giggling.]
broodingnewborn: [Did ... Did t_c just try to bat you away?]
broodingnewborn_4: [t_c must be the quietest kit you've ever met!]
stable_newborn_01: (They bury their nose into their little paws.)
stable_newborn_02: (They shift in their sleep, chest rising and falling slowly)
stable_newborn_03: (They press into your belly, snuggling closer.)
stable_newborn_04: (They kick their legs in their sleep in a running motion.)
stable_newborn_05: (They wail at the top of their lungs.)
stable_newborn_06: (They rest against their siblings and purr. It seems they have already made an unbreakable promise of protection- far earlier then what you would have expected!)
stable_newborn_07: (They lay still and quiet, you press your nose to them in fear to make sure they're okay, seems they're just a quiet one...)
stable_newborn_08: (They squirm up to you and place their paws on your nose, holding you as close as they can.)
stable_newborn_09: (Never did you think a kitten could say meow' so bluntly but here you are.)
stable_newborn_10: (They puff out their little chest as they peep in protest of staying still in the nest- it seems they want to explore before they can even see!)
stable_newborn_11: (They shake their head at you disapprovingly. They have so much to learn...)
stable_newborn_113: [You watch curiously as t_c opens their little mouth again and again making a small popping sound. They're so cute!!!]
stable_newborn_14: [t_c boops your nose as you roll into them.]
stable_newborn_15: [You climb on top of t_c's back and begin to purr as their tiny body settles. The two of you seem comfortable despite the distant yowling of your parents in worry. y_p attempts to separate the two of you.]
[To their disdain a few moments you both are in the same spot but this time t_c sleeps on your back.]
stable_newborn_16: [y_p carefully places a moss blanket over you and your littermates. You smile softly as you curl up under the warm coverage. t_c nudges your paw and settles beside you.]
[Together like this, you're safe. Nothing outside the nursery matters. Not here and now, not while you and t_c are together.]
stable_newborn_17: [t_c cheekily giggles as they roll around the nest, you and y_l purr in tiny laughter as you squint watching their little form.]
stable_newborn_18: [You flinch back as t_c yowls in your little ear- well there's always one.]
stable_newborn_19: [You and t_c snuggle together in a pile of feathers that r_q gave y_p as a present. You both smile as you knead the soft texture. t_c seems like their especially enjoying it.]
stable_newborn_21: [You curl again y_p and shiver slightly as a cool breeze enters the nursery. Despite their small size, t_c takes notice.]
[y_p stares in shock at the little kitten who spoke so clearly only to see tiny t_c pointing at you with their little paws. y_p immediately pulls you both closer and purrs loudly.]
unabashed_newborn1: [You spot t_c crawling around in circles when they suddenly bite r_c's leg.]
cool_newborn_1: [t_c mewls in response to you saying their name.]
[It appears as if they're already trying to puff out the fur of their chest.]
cool_newborn_2: [t_c wobbles their little paws out in front of themself, mewling loudly]
[Fresh to the world, it seems like they're already trying to find steady ground to explore.]
upstanding_newborn: [As you turn to comfort t_c, you spot a few kits trying to sneak out of the nursery!]
upstanding_newborn1: [t_c mewls angrily as they're shoved out of their nest.]
upstanding_newborn2: [t_c is hard at work, kneading their nest with itty-bitty paws.]
neurotic_newborn1: [t_c buries themself deep into the fluff of t_p's tail.]
neurotic_newborn2: [t_c is buried under a pile of their siblings!]
neurotic_newborn3: [You can barely make out t_c, they're so deeply buried in their parent's nest.]
newborn_yourkit: [t_c snuggles deep into your belly fur.]
[You wrap your tail around them, shielding them from the cold.]
newborn_yourkit1: [t_c squirms at your side, mewling frantically.]
[You lick the top of their head, quieting their cries.]
newborn_yourkit2: [t_c presses against your side, sound asleep.]
[You breathe in their milky scent, swearing to love them forever.]
newborn_yourkit3: [You run your beautiful new kit's perfect name over and over through your mind, certain you'll never ever forget it.]
newborn_UNLAWFUL: [t_c reaches up and bats at you. Their tiny claws prick your nose.]
newborn_UNLAWFUL2: [t_c managed to wiggle their way out of their nest and is trying to make their way out of the nursery.]
newborn_unlawful: [t_c is already trying to crawl out of the nest!]
newborn_unlawful1: [What's this newborn doing outside of the nursery?]
[You pick up the kit and return it to r_q. t_c is gonna be a troublemaker, you can already tell.]
newborn_unabashed1: [t_c looks up at you, seeming confused and almost wary.]
[...did they just make a face of disgust?]
[You want to feel offended, but it's kind of hilarious to see that expression on a newborn's face.]
newborn_unabashed2: [They seem pretty proud of themself when they disturb one of the other kits. What a little nuisance!]
newborn_unabashed3: [t_c is shoving all the other kits out of their way. How can a newborn be this unstoppable?!]
newborn_unabashed4: [t_c is squirming and shoving poor t_l around.]
[...It looks like t_l has just accepted their fate.]
stable_newborn_13: [You watch curiously as t_c opens their little mouth again and again making a small popping sound. They're so cute!!!]
newborn_fromlittermate: [You're trying to find your way to a queen to feed you when... SMACK!]
[t_c has shoved you out of the way!]
newborn_fromlittermate2: [You snuggle up next to t_c, falling into a peaceful slumber.]
newborn_fromlittermate3: [You mew at t_c, and they turn to stare at you.]
newborn_fromlittermate4: [You mew at t_c, and they turn to stare at you, before squeaking back a reply.]
[This turns into a meow war, that ends with you winning by mewling far louder than t_c- and promptly getting shushed by the queens.]
newborn_fromlittermate5: [You step on t_c's tail, and they bite you in return. The two of you get into a fight, and have to be separated.]
newborn_fromlittermate6: [You start crying, but t_c snuggles next to you, and the comforting warmth makes you calm down.]
[You two sleep for the day, not making a peep.]

they_starving_4: [A newborn kitten kneads against a queen trying to get milk, but seemingly being unable to.]
[The queen gives you a sad glance before gently licking their forehead.]
sweet_newborn_3: [t_c seems to let out a very polite mew towards you, wiggling towards you in order to lean against you.]
sweet_newborn_4: [Seems the kitten only started purring when you drew near.]
sweet_newborn_6: [You weren't having a good day, sighing as you lay down on a rock close to the Nursery.]
[You feel the small t_c plop down on your tail. You have no idea how they got here.]
[They seemed drawn to you though, and kept snuggling you... and you start to feel better.]
